content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received a command to get hyperlinks from the website https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_languages_by_number_of_native_speakers. I also received two new commands from the user to get hyperlinks from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World and https://www.nationalgeographic.com/. However, my computer failed to execute the command to get hyperlinks due to too much output. The user then gave me a command to google popular programming languages, which returned a list of links.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.tiobe.com/tiobe-index/", "question": "What are the most popular programming languages?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The most popular programming languages according to the TIOBE Index for May 2023 are Python, C, Java, C++, and C#. The index also notes that it is difficult for new programming languages to enter the top 100, and that older languages like Fortran are experiencing a revival. The TIOBE index is based on various factors and can be used to make strategic decisions about which language to adopt for new software systems. \n \n Links: ['Klik hier om een alternatieve browser te downloaden (http://outdatedbrowser.com/nl)', ' (https://www.tiobe.com)', 'About us (https://www.tiobe.com/about-us/)', 'About us (https://www.tiobe.com/about-us/)', 'Join TIOBE (https://www.tiobe.com/about-us/join-tiobe/)']"}]
"""
